items.content_html: MERN Auth is a lightweight full-stack web application with user authentication, protected routes, and image uploads. Built using MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js, it offers a simple yet powerful solution for implementing authentication in your projects.
items.title: SarangaSiriwardhana9/Full-Stack-MERN-Auth-project: MERN Auth is a lightweight full-stack web application with user authentication, protected routes, and image uploads. Built using MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js, it offers a simple yet powerful solution for implementing authentication in your projects.
